content.en: Algorithmic vehicle optimization: Researchers have been investigating the impact of different algorithms on the performance of hybrid and electric vehicles. These algorithms, such as regenerative braking control algorithms, cooperative braking control algorithms, and predictive braking control algorithms, are designed to optimize energy efficiency, braking stability, and driving comfort. By developing and implementing these algorithms, researchers aim to enhance the overall performance and safety of electric vehicles while maximizing energy recovery during braking.
content.da: Algoritmisk køretøjsoptimering: Forskere har undersøgt virkningen af forskellige algoritmer på ydeevnen af hybrid- og elbiler. Disse algoritmer, såsom regenerative bremsekontrolalgoritmer, kooperative bremsekontrolalgoritmer og forudsigende bremsekontrolalgoritmer, er designet til at optimere energieffektivitet, bremse stabilitet og kørekomfort. Ved at udvikle og implementere disse algoritmer sigter forskere på at forbedre den overordnede ydeevne og sikkerhed af elbiler, samtidig med at energigenvindingen under bremsning maksimeres.
